channel.title: Forecasting on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Forecasting on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: DeformableTST: Transformer for Time Series Forecasting without Over-reliance on Patching
item.description: DeformableTST: a new Transformer model for time series forecasting that surpasses existing methods by reducing over-reliance on patching, enhancing performance and adaptability.
